overview:
Medical Billing service offer high level of scalability, and have provided EMR Medical billing and billing services for independent medical practices and large scale, multi specialty health care organizations.

Professional medical Billing Service: The medical Billing Service, offered by Billingparadise, strictly adheres to, HIPAA norms and HL7 regulations for the electronic data transmission of medical files. After transmitting the claims file to the insurance provider of the patient we ensure that we coordinate with the insurer and are available 24x7 throughout the claims processing cycle.

We guarantee HIPAA compliance and data security. Billingparadise provides EMR Medical Billing and <a href="http://www.billingparadise.com/contact-us.html">Medical Billing Service california</a> that are completely HIPAA compliant and we follow stringent data security guidelines. We only allow limited and strictly monitored access to the medical data. All health care records are password protected and are suitably encrypted. We follow all the guidelines laid down by HIPAA and ensure that every aspect of our medical coding and billing services, matches up to the highest of data security standards.
